info.introduction: I'm {name}, a Full-Stack Developer with 7+ years of crafting digital experiences. I don't just write code; I build scalable, high-performance engines using Laravel, Vue, and Node.js. From architecting complex backends to polishing pixel-perfect frontends, I bridge the gap between technical complexity and user simplicity. My mission? To turn ambitious ideas into reliable, market-ready software.
info.description_1: I am a Full-Stack Developer with 7+ years of experience crafting digital experiences. I don't just write code; I build scalable, high-performance engines using Laravel, Vue, and Node.js.
info.description_2: From architecting complex backends to polishing pixel-perfect frontends, I bridge the gap between technical complexity and user simplicity. My mission is to turn ambitious ideas into reliable, market-ready software.

clean_code.title: Clean Code & Architecture
clean_code.description: I prioritize maintainability, scalability, and SOLID principles to ensure robust backend systems.

user_centric.title: User-Centric Design
user_centric.description: Every pixel and interaction is crafted with the end-user in mind for intuitive experiences.

scalable_performance.title: Scalable Performance
scalable_performance.description: Building high-performance systems that can grow and handle increasing loads without compromising speed.

continuous_evolution.title: Continuous Evolution
continuous_evolution.description: Committed to lifelong learning, staying ahead of tech trends to deliver future-proof solutions.

educertify.title: EduCertify
educertify.short_description: Educertify is a platform for creating, customizing, and sending digital certificates with ease.
educertify.full_description: Educertify is a certificate generation and distribution platform designed for easy customization. Users can personalize certificates by changing fonts, colors, and adding signatures. The platform also supports uploading pre-signed certificates or digitally signing them directly. Once created, certificates can be sent to recipients via email, making the distribution process efficient. Educertify enables users to generate professional certificates with ease and flexibility, offering both customization and automated delivery.

features.dashboard: Admin dashboard for certificate tracking and analytics

animehero.title: Anime Hero Challengue
animehero.short_description: Anime Hero Challengue is a fun and engaging character guessing game featuring Dragon Ball and Pokémon characters.
animehero.full_description: Anime Hero Challengue is an interactive game that challenges users to identify characters from Dragon Ball or Pokémon. Players select between the two series, and a character silhouette is displayed. Users must guess the character from multiple choices, earning points for correct guesses. If they answer incorrectly, the score resets, and they are encouraged to try again. GuessMaster combines fun with competition, providing endless entertainment for fans of these iconic franchises.

features.selection: Selection of Dragon Ball and Pokémon anime characters
features.scoring: Point-based scoring system for correct guesses
features.series: Option to choose between different anime series
features.api: API integration for dynamic character information
features.responsive: Responsive design for a smooth experience on all devices
features.expansion: Future expansion with additional anime series

elfec.title: ELFEC
elfec.short_description: ELFEC is a CMS for managing services and customer support for the electricity company in Cochabamba.
elfec.full_description: ELFEC is a platform designed for comprehensive management of electrical services, enabling the Electricity Company of Cochabamba (ELFEC) to provide efficient service to its customers. The platform allows for user account management, bill inquiries, and fault reporting, facilitating communication between the company and its users. Additionally, the CMS includes features for generating reports and statistics on consumption and customer satisfaction, thereby improving service quality. elfec.bo aims to enhance customer experience and optimize the company's internal operations.

features.analytics: Admin dashboard with customer and service data analysis
features.mobile_access: Mobile access for efficient management anywhere
